import React from 'react' import {HiArrowNarrowRight} from 'react-icons/hi' const Home = () => { return (
{/* Container */}

Hi, my name is

Hugo Goncalves

I'm a Full-Stack Developer

I specialize in crafting outstanding digital experiences as a full-stack developer, with occasional involvement in design. At the moment, my primary focus is on creating responsive full-stack web applications.

) } export default Home
